summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3998 for the improvement of 44th Avenue Southwest, from West Massachusetts Street to West Lander Street and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48598, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
